data.message: Marshall...you are dumber than I ever thought "I love the troops I hate Trump and if you support Trump then F#$# you." So...that would be more than half the Troops Douche!@  You won't be invited back, Slim!!  Omg!!  Do you really think YOU are in any position to advise the military, police, first responders and those with actual bravery and integrity how to vote? And F us if we voted against Hillary??
